description:
Practice inside and send outside, all in the same harness. Made using incredibly strong X-PLY sailing fabric, the Levante is a durable and comfy harness that holds its own wherever you climb. Built in gear loops and ice tool holders give you a workhorse harness to help get you from the bottom to the top.

  • X-PLY sailing fabric is durable and waterproof, so it’s ready for years of service in the gym or on an ice wall
  • 3-D mesh belt and leg loop fabric provide a comfortable and precise fit to keep you going for longer
  • 5 gear loops hold all your protection and slings to give you full confidence while sending the routes
  • 2 ice clipper slots and 2 ice screw holders organise the chaos for pure bliss on the climb
  • Reinforced tie points improve resistance to rope friction, making your harness look fresher and last longer
name: Grivel Levante Harness
